# Short Description (132 characters)
Create desktop shortcuts for your favorite websites with a single click. Save time accessing your most-visited pages directly from your desktop.

# Detailed Description
KeepSite - Your Simple Website Shortcut Creator

Transform any webpage into a desktop shortcut instantly. Whether it's your favorite news site, work platform, or frequently visited web app, KeepSite helps you access them faster.

üìù How to Use:
